q: U.S. even invaded Afghanistan, but at the same meeting, he also talked about Rummy's son's drug addiction, so all Rummy could do was cry about that. Whoops! And this: Ah, there you have it. Donald Rumsfeld could have said, ''What the f- are you talking about going to war with Iraq for? Our country was just attacked by a foreign terrorist organization we need to go try to destroy. Iraq has nothing to do with this. Aren't you more concerned with winning this war we haven't even begun yet? But instead, his son had done some drugs. Sure thing, Donald Rumsfeld . musical guest next Wednesday, Feb. 9. Elton John will chat with David Letterman on the Feb. 9 show, along with actor Ty Burrell . Tom Carper said Delaware business owners ''made a good point,'' but there's more than one way to fix those concerns. He supported a different repeal measure last week that would have been financed by eliminating tax loopholes for oil and gas companies. That measure failed.
